EmailTemplate.description: This template is used to sent reminder while AM is unfreeze by RSM user
EmailTemplate.name: APL AM/Relay Unfreeze Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Your AM/Relay Forecast was Unfrozen by RSM
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!APL_Forecast_Management__c.Manager__c},
Your AM/Relay forecast for Territory Code : {!APL_Forecast_Management__c.A6_Code__c} was Unfrozen by RSM user, please check.
Best Regards, System Administrator
